params.sqlcmd: "INSERT INTO " +" USER_MST(USER_CD, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, COMPANY_CD, PLANT_CD, SECTION_CD, LOCALE, ADDRESS, APPR_POWER_TYP, PASSWORD_CHG_DATE) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?))"

"SELECT " +" USER_CD, " +" USER_NAME, " +" PASSWORD, " +" COMPANY_CD, " +" PLANT_CD, " +" SECTION_CD, " +" LOCALE, " +" ADDRESS, " +" APPR_POWER_TYP, " +" TO_CHAR(PASSWORD_CHG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"FROM " +" USER_MST " +"WHERE " +" USER_CD = ?"

"UPDATE " +" USER_MST " +"SET " +" USER_NAME = ?, " +" PASSWORD = ?, " +" PLANT_CD = ?, " +" SECTION_CD = ?, " +" LOCALE = ?, " +" ADDRESS = ?, " +" APPR_POWER_TYP = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" PASSWORD_CHG_DATE = TO_DATE(?) " +"WHERE " +" USER_CD = ?"
